cards.name: Bone Shredder
cards.text:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

rulings.text: Paying for echo is always optional. When the echo triggered ability resolves, if you can't pay the echo cost or choose not to, you sacrifice that permanent.

Your permanent's echo ability will trigger at the beginning of your upkeep if it entered the battlefield since the beginning of your last upkeep, or if you gained control of it since the beginning of your last upkeep.

cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
cards.flavorText: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

rulings.text: You can't simply unequip Equipment from a creature. If Lightning Greaves is attached to the only creature you control, you won't be able to attach other equipment to it (or target it with anything else) until you have another creature onto which you can move Lightning Greaves.

If a creature enters the battlefield under your control and gains haste, but then loses it before attacking, it won't be able to attack that turn. This means that you can't use one Lightning Greaves to allow two new creatures to attack in the same turn.

foreignData.flavorText: 稲妻が崖を打った後、鉱石は鉄となり、鉄は鋼となり、鋼はすね当てとなった。 稲妻はそこに残ったままだ。
foreignData.name: 稲妻のすね当て
foreignData.text:
装備しているクリーチャーは被覆と速攻を持つ。
装備 {0}
foreignData.type: アーティファクト — 装備品

cards.name: Phyrexian Totem
cards.text:
{T}: Add {B}.
{2}{B}: Phyrexian Totem becomes a 5/5 black Phyrexian Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn.
Whenever Phyrexian Totem is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.

rulings.text: When damage is dealt to Phyrexian Totem, its triggered ability will trigger. A number of permanents equal to the amount of damage dealt will be sacrificed when the ability resolves. It doesn’t matter if Phyrexian Totem isn’t on the battlefield when the ability resolves, as long as Phyrexian Totem was a creature as it left the battlefield. If one of the permanents sacrificed is Phyrexian Totem itself, the requisite number of other permanents must still be sacrificed.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

ファイレクシアのトーテム像にダメージが与えられるたび、それがクリーチャーである場合、その点数に等しい数のパーマネントを生け贄に捧げる。

cards.flavorText: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Tendrils of Corruption tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You don’t gain X life.

foreignData.name: 堕落の触手
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。堕落の触手はそれにＸ点のダメージを与え、あなたはＸ点のライフを得る。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: As Living Death resolves, all players exile their creature cards from graveyards at the same time. Then all players sacrifice all creatures they control at the same time. Then all players put all creatures they exiled onto the battlefield at the same time.

Only cards exiled by Living Death’s first instruction are put onto the battlefield. If a replacement effect (such as that of Leyline of the Void) causes any of the sacrificed creatures to be exiled instead of put into a graveyard, those cards aren’t returned to the battlefield.

foreignData.name: 生ける屍
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーは、自分の墓地からすべてのクリーチャー・カードを追放し、その後自分がコントロールするすべてのクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げ、その後これにより追放されたすべてのカードを戦場に出す。

cards.name: Urza's Rage
cards.text:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
This spell can't be countered.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

rulings.text: A spell or ability that counters spells can still target Urza’s Rage. When that spell or ability resolves, Urza’s Rage won’t be countered, but any additional effects of that spell or ability will still happen.

If the target for Urza’s Rage becomes an illegal target, the spell won’t resolve and will be put into its owner’s graveyard with no effect. This is true even if its damage can’t be prevented and even though it can’t be countered.

foreignData.name: ウルザの激怒
foreignData.text:
キッカー {8}{R} （あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{8}{R}を支払ってもよい。）
ウルザの激怒は呪文や能力によって打ち消されない。
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。ウルザの激怒はそれに３点のダメージを与える。 ウルザの激怒がキッカーされている場合、代わりにウルザの激怒はそのクリーチャーやプレイヤーに10点のダメージを与え、そのダメージは軽減されない。

cards.name: Thornscape Battlemage
cards.text:
Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

rulings.text: You choose whether to kick a spell as you cast it, and you pay that much along with the spell’s mana cost at the same time. Kicking a spell is always optional.
You can pay any particular kicker cost only once. You can’t pay it multiple times to get multiples of either triggered ability.
If Thornscape Battlemage is put onto the battlefield as the result of a spell or ability, there’s no opportunity to kick it.
Kicker costs don’t change a spell’s mana cost or mana value.

荊景学院の戦闘魔道士が戦場に出たとき、それが{R}のキッカーでキッカーされている場合、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。荊景学院の戦闘魔道士はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
荊景学院の戦闘魔道士が戦場に出たとき、それが{W}のキッカーでキッカーされている場合、アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。

cards.name: Evasive Action
cards.text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavorText: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

foreignData.flavorText: すぐれた指揮官は地形をうまく利用する術をすぐに身につける。
foreignData.name: 回避行動
foreignData.text: 版図 ― 呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが、あなたがコントロールする土地の中の基本土地タイプ１つにつき{1}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。

cards.name: Tribal Flames
cards.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
cards.flavorText:
"Fire is the universal language."
—Jhoira, master artificer

rulings.text: Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

cards.name: Coalition Relic
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

rulings.text: If you remove multiple charge counters from Coalition Relic at once, you may add a different color of mana to your mana pool for each one.
Only the first main phase each turn is considered a precombat main phase, even if additional main phases or combat phases are created.

The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. cards.name: Harrow
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavorText: No spot in nature is truly barren.

rulings.text: The sacrifice of a land is part of the cost of casting Harrow. You can’t pay this cost more than once to get a multiple effect.
The two lands do not count toward your normal one land you can play each turn.
Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然の中には、真の意味で不毛の地などはないのだ。
foreignData.name: 砕土
foreignData.text:
砕土を唱えるための追加コストとして、土地を１つ生け贄に捧げる。
あなたのライブラリーから基本土地カードを最大２枚まで探し、それらを戦場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

cards.name: Armadillo Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavorText: "Don't laugh. It works."

rulings.text: While Armadillo Cloak’s last ability is similar to lifelink, it isn’t lifelink—it’s a normal triggered ability. If a creature you control with lifelink wears an Armadillo Cloak and deals damage, first you’ll gain that much life for lifelink, and then Armadillo Cloak’s triggered ability is put onto the stack. This also means that multiple instances of Armadillo Cloak’s triggered ability do trigger separately.
If Armadillo Cloak enchants a creature you don’t control, you’ll gain life when it deals damage, as long as that damage hasn’t already caused you to lose the game.

foreignData.flavorText: 「笑うなよ。 ちゃんと役に立つんだ。」

rulings.text: You draw one card per basic land type, not for each basic land. This makes it a maximum of 5 cards.
Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
cards.flavorText: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

foreignData.flavorText: ラノワールには７つのエルフェイムがある。エルフェイムとは王国と言ってもよいもので、それぞれに支配者がいる。 その宮殿は、畏敬と驚異と羨望の的である。
foreignData.name: エルフェイムの宮殿
foreignData.text:
エルフェイムの宮殿はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}か{W}を加える。

cards.name: Shivan Oasis
cards.text:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
cards.flavorText: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

foreignData.flavorText: 生き残ってあの果物を口にできるのは、よほど耐久力のある冒険家だけだ。
foreignData.name: シヴのオアシス
foreignData.text:
シヴのオアシスはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{G}を加える。

cards.name: Terramorphic Expanse
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

foreignData.name: 広漠なる変幻地
foreignData.text: {T}, 広漠なる変幻地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
